description.paragraph1: The idea behind this site came from a question: What happens if I mix programming with adventure stories?
description.paragraph2: The Indiana Jones-style atmosphere blends perfectly with the logical and often enigmatic topics of programming. Add a blog dedicated to coding, a Notes section where I collect my thoughts, a collection of programming exercises, and a touch of flat design as the background, and here it is: Adventures Code.

phases.description: Preliminary study: I deepened my knowledge of WordPress and the Elementor plugin, as I wasnâ€™t very confident with the tools to use.
Organizational development: I started a new WordPress project, creating the preliminary design with Figma and defining the page hierarchy to ensure intuitive navigation.
Visual design: Color palette and typography. I used the green from my portfolio for key elements and the soft white for the background.
Optimization: I worked on SEO, search engine optimization, and improved the site's navigation.

mainDifficulties.heading: Main Difficulties
mainDifficulties.description: I studied SEO for the first time, learning how to optimize content for search engines, gained experience in creating artistic illustrations on Figma, and further honed my skills in graphic design and creating visual elements.

resultsAndConclusions.heading: Results and Conclusions
resultsAndConclusions.description: A blog and alternative writing site, with a fresh and modern design, offering an engaging and visually pleasing user experience, easy to navigate, and well-optimized for the web.
